TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
Now can we all please move away from a bummer of a topic as marketing talk in this thread? We want the community pumped and having fun (yes, actual fun) everywhere, even in places we don't have a direct hand in. There's no crazier place to be these days than on a hype vehicle of choice.

Ha, I'll admit I'm dry, but I was showing legitimate praise for Squad's marketing, as someone who works in marketing. It's really very good, without sarcasm.

It's at least better than whichever agency does Joan Rivers' marketing.

Anyway, I'm not trying to unravel things, I just like 'frontline' reports like Majiir's. Back on the train.

http://i.imgur.com/LjeS6u0.png

Can I board yet?

That's an... interesting ticket. Here, step inside this box that is totally not a suspected ticket-fraud box and we'll "talk".
I'm on the HypeÃ¢â€žÂ¢ TrainÃ¢â€žÂ¢ to HyperspaceÃ¢â€žÂ¢.
What if we did a HYPETRAIN powered by jets with wings, so it is capable of can into space.

What if we did a HYPETRAIN powered by jets with wings, so it is capable of can into space.

We don't need wings where we're going.

Isn't it a little too early to be getting this hyped? We still probably have another week of experimentals...

Its just I don't want to overhype before hyping up for the big hype, otherwise I won't be hyped enough when the time comes to be hyped the most ;P

But if you actually do that, it's a violation of law. HypeTracks are owned by HypeRailTrans, HypePlane is JediTransport (right? at any rate they're different companies), so if your plane latches on, it's trespassing. And we will sue you!

We have stealth invisibility systems, so you never know when we're latched on. Can't sue us if you don't have evidence!

CHOO FRICKIN CHOO

Schwerer Gustav

We have stealth invisibility systems, so you never know when we're latched on. Can't sue us if you don't have evidence!

"These are not the planes you're looking for..."

We have stealth invisibility systems, so you never know when we're latched on. Can't sue us if you don't have evidence!

Surely a giant aircraft doing quintuple track drifting while going commercial airliner speeds would make sparks fly and leave marks on the tracks.

Surely a giant aircraft doing quintuple track drifting while going commercial airliner speeds would make sparks fly and leave marks on the tracks.

We tied a guy with a mop to the back. Don't worry, we pay him fairly, and he loves the job. Totally...

We tied a guy with a mop to the back. Don't worry, we pay him fairly, and he loves the job. Totally...

Umm... you do realize that you are giving the hypegovernment intel by posting these things... they will get you!!!

Umm... you do realize that you are giving the hypegovernment intel by posting these things... they will get you!!!

Uh oh.

Attention passengers, this HypePlane has been grounded by Hype Security. Please be patient while we sort this problem out. Thank you.

We have stealth invisibility systems, so you never know when we're latched on. Can't sue us if you don't have evidence!

Then you gain no Hype.
I think take-off from Australia will be delayed due to the lvl 3 terror level. (Insert topical humour here)
This update's HypeThread has dissolved from "hypehypehype we want the update!" into "the hypetrain is better than the hypeplane!"

This update's HypeThread has dissolved from "hypehypehype we want the update!" into "the hypetrain is better than the hypeplane!"

Its the only way to decide which vehicle is better the have hype on
Will we get our weekly reveal?

*gasping*

Stupid... HypeTrain...

So fast. *collapses, crawls into a coach near the back*

I made it!

This update's HypeThread has dissolved from "hypehypehype we want the update!" into "the hypetrain is better than the hypeplane!"

This will have been called The Great HypeRace of 0.25.
